Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli NCTC 10418 (MIC=214 µM) and Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788 (MIC=214 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Alyteserin-1Ma has lower antimicrobial potencies (MIC>200 µM).

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptides and alytesin are co-secreted from the venom of the Midwife toad, Alytes maurus (Alytidae, Anura) Implications for the evolution of frog skin defensive secretions.
Literature.Author: König E, Zhou M, Wang L, Chen T, Bininda-Emonds OR, Shaw C.
